TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ThemeColor extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents possible color variants for the Microsoft themes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each theme potentially has multiple color variants, which, presumably, are visually similar but in different colors. Luna, for example, has all three color variants: Homestead, Metallic, and NormalColor. Aero and Royale have NormalColor.
Classic doesn't have a color variant, but instead uses color schemes, including Pumpkin, Rose, and Spruce. A color scheme, unlike a color variant, defines values for each of the colors which make up the system palette as well as certain values for certain metrics like font names and sizes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor Homestead = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Used by the Luna theme; the localized color name is Olive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor Metallic = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Used by the Luna theme; the localized color name is Sliver.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ThemeColor NormalColor = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Used by the Luna, Aero, and Classic themes; the localized color name is Blue.
